description:
Do you love Mahjong, but don’t want to be part of the thrilling campaign in Mahjong 3D – Warriors of the Emperor? Then Mahjong 3D – Essentials is just what you’re looking for! Fast and exciting fun guaranteed!

Dive into an exotic world and experience the famous Chinese board game in breathtaking 3D! Be enchanted and enthralled by beautiful backgrounds – they make this Mahjong game a very special experience.

With Mahjong 3D Essentials, you get fast and exciting brainteasers for in-between times – 70 levels in three degrees of difficulty: easy, medium, and hard.

Build your own puzzles with the level editor – endless fun guaranteed!

Features
70 exciting levels in easy, medium, and hard
Level editor: Create your own Mahjong boards and have endless fun
Be enchanted by the breathtaking 3D graphics and the exotic backgrounds
name: Mahjong 3D - Essentials
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
